game.name: Cooking Vanilla Ice Cream
game.description:
Are you much excited to try something sweet, delicious, and refreshing in this coming summer? If so, you must try one of the most popular Sara online cooking game - Cooking Vanilla Ice Cream and give yourself an ultimate treat with the extremely delicious dessert meal. In this challenging yet interesting free online cooking game, your goal is to follow the Sara instructions properly and prepare creamy, really cold and vanilla flavored ice cream. 

You can use this highly scrumptious food item as a dessert or a snack in front of your friends and family in hot summer days. All you need to follow all the steps with an open mind and implement it to deliver the optimum possible outcomes. Sara kitchen is equipped all the ingredients and equipment required to help you make your mission successful. She is a cooking expert and makes sure that you will be able to learn the best from the best. 

When playing this cool flash game in your browser, you will have a wonderful chance to whip up this awesome and classic vanilla goodness. Once you try it at your home, you can rest assured of making it again and again. Play your favorite cooking game for girls and learn something that is great for the summertime! In this free online game, you will also have an opportunity to decorate your ice cream with a huge variety of candies and nuts. Make fun and learn at a single place!
